headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Get Double Rewards in Project Overthrow and LSA Operations
content:
Jump into the Avenger Operations Terminal and join forces with ex-con-turned-mercenary Charlie Reed for Project Overthrow Missions and LSA Operations â€“ both paying double GTA$ and RP, all week long.

Plus, get rare rewards in the final week of the San Andreas Mercenaries Bonuses Event.
